body: Constructed of mithral, each of these pauldrons bears an embossed device of a viper coiled defensively. These pauldrons grant their wearer a +2 dodge bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity, and increase the wearer's CMD by 2 against bull rush, grapple, reposition, and trip combat maneuvers.
